data.title: Andrew Hill discography
data.text:
The Complete Blue Note Andrew Hill Sessions (1963-66), Andrew Hill, 1995, Mosaic MD7-161

Tracks : CD 1: Land Of Nod, Black Fire (alt take), Cantarnos, McNeil Island, Tired Trade, Pumpkin, Pumpkin (alt take), Subterfuge, Black Fire, Smokestack (alt take), Smokestack / CD 2: Wailing Wall, Ode To Von, Ode To Von (alt take), The Day After, The Day After (alt take), Verne, Not So (alt take), Not So, 30 Pier Avenue, Judgment / CD 3: Flea Flop, Siete Ocho, Alfred, Yokada, Yokada (alt take), Yokada, Yokada, Reconciliation, Refuge, Dedication (alt take) / CD 4: Dedication, New Monastery, New Monastery (alt take), Flight 19 (alt take), Flight 19, Spectrum, Black Monday, Symmetry, Symmetry (alt take) / CD 5: The Griots, The Griots (alt take), Duplicity, Le Serpent Qui Danse, No Doubt, Euterpe, Euterpe (alt take), Calliope, Pax / CD 6: Eris, Erato, Roots 'N Herbs, Compulsion, Limbo, Legacy, Premonition / CD 7: Violence, Violence (alt take), Hope, Illusion, Pain, Desire, Desire (alt take), Lust

Notes : A 7 CD (or 10 LP) set of Andrew Hill's sessions for Blue Note between 1963 and 1966. The music was originally released on the Andrew Hill albums Black Fire, Smoke Stack, Judgment!, Point Of Departure, Andrew!!!, One For One and Compulsion, and on the Sam Riversalbum Involution. In addition there are 11 previously unreleased tracks.

Mosaic Select 16: Andrew Hill, 2005, Mosaic MS-016

Tracks : CD 1: Without Malice, Ocho Rios, Diddy Wah, Ode to Infinity, The Dance, Satin Lady, Ocho Rios, Monkash, Mahogany / CD 2: Illusion, Poinsettia, Fragments, Soul Mate, Illusion, Interfusion, Resolution, Chained, MOMA, Nine at the Bottom, Six at the Top, Nine at the Bottom / CD 3: For Blue People Only, Enamorado, Mother's Tale, Oriba, Oriba, Awake, Now, I, Yomo, Prevue

Musicians : Andrew Hill, Charles Tolliver (tracks 1:1 to 1:7), Woody Shaw (tracks 3:1 to 3:5), Pat Patrick (tracks 1:1 to 1:7), Bennie Maupin (tracks 1:1 to 1:7 and 2:1 to 2:5), Carlos Garnett (tracks 1:8 & 1:9), Sam Rivers (tracks 3:1 to 3:10), Howard Johnson (tracks 3:1 to 3:5), Robin Kenyatta (tracks 3:1 to 3:10), Ron Carter (tracks 1:1 to 1:7 and 2:1 to 2:12), Richard Davis (tracks 1:8 & 1:9), Herbie Lewis (tracks 3:1 to 3:5), Cecil McBee (tracks 3:6 to 3:10), Sanford Allen (tracks 1:8, 1:9 & 2:1 to 2:5), Selwart Clarke (tracks 1:8, 1:9 & 2:1 to 2:5), Booker Rowe (tracks 1:8 & 1:9), Al Brown (tracks 2:1 to 2:5), Kermit Moore (tracks 1:8, 1:9 & 2:1 to 2:5), Paul Motian (tracks 1:2, 1:3 & 1:5), Ben Riley (tracks 1:1, 1:4, 1:6 & 1:7), Freddie Waits (tracks 1:8 & 1:9), Teddy Robinson (tracks 2:6 to 2:12 & 3:1 to 3:10), Nadi Qamar (Spaulding Givens) (tracks 3:6 to 3:10)

Notes : Music recorded for Blue Note between 1967 and 1970. Six of the tracks have been released before on the One For One collection. The remaining 25 tracks are previously unreleased.
